description: Day trip to Osaka from Kyoto - experience Japan's food capital and Osaka Castle.

activities.description: Travel to Osaka: Rapid train from Kyoto Station to Osaka Station
Visit Osaka Castle and surrounding park
Travel to Dotonbori: Osaka Metro from Osakajo-koen to Namba
Lunch in Dotonbori - famous street food and takoyaki
Travel to Kuromon Market: Walk from Dotonbori to Kuromon
Explore Kuromon Ichiba Market for fresh seafood
Travel back to Kyoto: Express train from Osaka to Kyoto

reservations.name: Osaka Capsule Hotel
reservations.description: Modern capsule hotel accommodation in Osaka - second night of stay for continued Osaka exploration

transportation: JR trains between Kyoto-Osaka, Osaka Metro within city
meals: Breakfast: Kyoto, Lunch: Dotonbori takoyaki and street food, Dinner: Kyoto
notes: Osaka is known as 'Japan's Kitchen' - try takoyaki, okonomiyaki, and fresh seafood! Keep ticket for multiple train rides.
